oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "A vote for Willis, will be a vote for Loeb"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; elections; Willis, A. W., Jr.; Loeb, Henry; Ingram, William B.; campaigns; politics;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Campaign pamphlet for William Ingram describing how Willis will be unable to win the election. Also contains a political cartoon depicting Willis being bribed by Loeb.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Sally Lineback
